pullRequest.title: fix grafana bug
pullRequest.bodyText:
bug 1:
in plugin simple json 1.4.1,the order of data and time has been changed, value of number will be behind  value of time.

bug 2:
if change interval according to hours, the value will be remained all the way.

nodes.bodyText:
Hi, what's this for?
I removed this and the test is also passed...
this looks reasonable, is this a bug before?
